data.title: About us – Grupo Ganga
data.text:
Ganga is a production company based in Madrid, focused on the production of drama series and prime time television programs. Our programming – recognized in Spain and abroad with more than a hundred awards – is identified by its outstanding quality and excellence.

We believe in the power of television to capture universal issues, and in our ability as professionals to entertain and move viewers worldwide.

The company has its own production center with nearly 8000 thousand square meters and all the facilities needed to take an audiovisual project from the original idea to the ready-to-broadcast production. Ganga is named as a tribute to the goddess of the river Ganges, and that is why its logo has the shape of liquid letters, in continuous change.

MIGUEL ÁNGEL BERNARDEAU

CEO

Founder and owner. With more than thirty years in the production sector. Back In the 90’s he pioneered the development of drama for non-public television, being responsible for hits such as Crooks in the Office and Dear Teacher, among others. His talent as a producer has been recognized at the Ondas awards and at international festivals such as the Montecarlo television festival, where he received the festival’s two top awards for his work at the helm of Remember When and Disappeared.

FEDERICO ESCALONA

Production Department

Trained as a director at the Centro de Estudios de Vídeo (CEV), he has been working for 25 years in the production of audiovisual fiction, both for television and film. During this time he has participated in the production of 10 TV series (El Tiempo Entre Costuras, Víctor Ros, HIT) and more than 20 feature films (World Oats, El Corazón de la Tierra, Planta Cuarta, Nos Miran). He has also been responsible for the production of the Goya Awards on seven editions.
